== Annallur (627912) ==

Annallur is a village in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 581 hectares and harbouring 1809 households with total population of 7070 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chalakudy]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 3425 and female population is 3645. Scheduled Caste Population is 1054 and Scheduled Tribes population is 5. Census Location Code of the village is 627912<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
